# Flutter Firebase CRUD App - mad_inclass14

This is a Flutter app for Georgia State University CSC 4360/6360 Mobile App Development.
The app demonstrates Firebase integration for CRUD operations on products with search and filtering capabilities.

## Project Structure
```
lib/
├─ main.dart
├─ firebase_options.dart          
├─ models/product.dart
├─ services/product_service.dart
└─ screens/home_page.dart
```

## Firebase Setup
1. Run `flutterfire configure` to connect to Firebase project
2. Select your Firebase project
3. Enable Firestore database

## Dependencies
- firebase_core: ^2.19.0
- cloud_firestore: ^4.12.0

## Features
- Create, Read, Update, Delete products
- Real-time search functionality
- Price range filtering
- Material 3 UI design
